testcase.system-out:
Scenario Outline: The total payment amount per month in a borrower schedule should equal the value # src/test/resources/FeatureFile/generatePlan.feature:52 from the annuity call Given details of "<loanAmount>","<nominalRate>",'<duration>' and "<startDate>" to create generate Plan request payload When user invoke rest service to generate Plan Then validate borrowerPaymentAmount of each month should be equal except the last month which can differ
Examples:
